reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major gram-positive bacterial infection categories: community-acquired pneumonia (3-4), skin/soft tissue infections (8-10), bloodstream infections (2-3), meningitis (1-2), endocarditis (1-2), other invasive infections (1-2). Total ~20.5 per 100k globally. Heterogeneous category with significant overlap and geographic variation due to antimicrobial resistance patterns and population differences.
